Betsy Cross

Mawgan Porth

This project is a personal reflection on my childhood summers in Mawgan Porth, Cornwall � a place that shaped so much of who I am. Through photographs and design, my project captures the rhythms, rituals and atmosphere of growing up by the sea. It�s about family, memory, and the beauty of the everyday. A quiet tribute to the people and the place that inspired it.
